tasks.label: Collect
tasks.command: conda run -n ACMEReal --live-stream python -u -m client.collect task=${fileBasenameNoExtension}

tasks.label: Eval
tasks.command: conda run -n ACMEReal --live-stream python -u -m client.eval task=${fileBasenameNoExtension}

tasks.label: Postprocess
tasks.command: conda run -n ACMEReal --live-stream env PYTHONPATH="${workspaceFolder}:${workspaceFolder}/submodules/FoundationStereo" python -u client/postprocess.py
